translation.en: How do you leave someone?
Really, truly leave them.
Leave them so far behind that… that it's like you never met?
translation.es: Olvidarlo de tal forma que es como si nunca lo hubieras conocido.

translation.en: - Maybe you should do another one. - Sam.
translation.es: - Tal vez deberías hacer otro. - Sam.

translation.en: What do you wanna do?
I just wanna sit here.
Yeah, but…
Look, G, I just want you to know that I support you in whatever decision you want to make.
translation.es: Mira, Geo, quiero que sepas que te apoyo en cualquier decisión que tomes.

translation.en: Okay.
- G, can you say something? - Sam.
I know you're trying to be sweet right now
and that you're worried about me.
translation.es: y que te preocupas por mí…

translation.en: But just stop.
Let's get married, G.
Let's do it. I'm serious. Let's get married.
What?
I love you.
They're here. I don't wanna make them wait.
translation.es: Están aquí. No quiero hacerlos esperar.

translation.en: I want you to order a self- drive on the way home.
- Don't let anyone drive you. Okay? - Okay.
translation.es: No dejes que nadie te lleve. Bueno.

translation.en: Sam, you're backing me up on this, right?
Sam?
Uh, yes.
Yes, Mr. and Mrs. Olsen, I got you.
Whose parents are gonna be there?
No one's parents, Dad. We're in college.
translation.es: No, papá. Estamos en la universidad.

translation.en: - Are you okay? - Mmm- hmm.
- You look a little green around the gills. - I'm fine, Mom. I'm just…
translation.es: ¿Estás bien? Pareces enferma. Estoy bien, mamá.

translation.en: - Can I have my coat, please, Eli? - Yes, ma'am.
translation.es: - ¿Me das mi abrigo, Eli? - Sí, señora.

translation.en: You need a scarf too.
You're not wearing enough.
What is this?
It's mine. And I want it back.
translation.es: Es mía. Y quiero que me la devuelvas.

translation.en: Uh, my purse too. Thank you.
Have fun, you two. Be safe.
Yes, sir, we won't be out too long. Good night, Mrs. Olsen.
translation.es: No saldremos hasta tarde. Buenas noches, señor Olsen.

translation.en: Thank you, Eli.
Happy Halloween, sir.
Eli, it's Christmas.
Of course. Merry Christmas, sir.
You missed. All right.
- Oh! - Oh shit.
Since 1969,
Raster Robotics has delivered cutting- edge AI…
translation.es: Raster Robotics llevó a su hogar inteligencia artificial de punta…

translation.en: Your hot chocolate, sir.
Thank you, Daniel.
- Hold up. Does this have rum in it? - Uh, it does not, sir.
Okay, shots for everyone, Daniel.
I'm sorry, your parents put a restriction on shots served.
translation.es: Lo siento. Sus padres restringieron los tragos.

translation.en: Ten- two- six- six.
Right away.
With limes.
- Do you have my phone? I can't find it. - No, I don't. Did you leave it?
translation.es: - ¿Tienes mi celular? No lo encuentro. - No. ¿Te lo olvidaste?

translation.en: Fuck. Did I not give it to you?
Uh, I'm… I'm good.
- Let me take that for you, G. - What?
- G, you shouldn't be drinking. - Stop.
Yo, are you two fighting? You seem like you're fighting.
- We're fine. - I didn't ask you, Samuel.
translation.es: - Estamos bien. - No te pregunté a ti.

translation.en: Sam, you're embarrassing me.
…elevate your android's evolution…
translation.es: …elevar la evolución de tu androide como nunca…

translation.en: Really?
Get the new OS this Christmas from Raster Robotics.
translation.es: Obtenga el nuevo sistema operativo esta Navidad de Raster Robotics.

translation.en: Dude, chill.
More than human.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Watch the elbows.
I've got it, sir. Not to worry.  Is this the first time you ever played, huh?
translation.es: - Yo me encargo, señor. No se preocupe. - ¿No sabes jugar?

translation.en: I'm pregnant.
God, I'm scared.
He's trying to be so sweet.
And… I'm not ready for this.
translation.es: pero yo no estoy lista para esto.

translation.en: I'm not even sure that I wanna be with him.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sé si quiero estar con él.

translation.en: - Did you tell him? - Yes.
That's why he's being so fucking dumb right now.
translation.es: Por eso actúa como un tonto.

translation.en: Fuck.
Fuck.
So what are you gonna do?
I… think I'm gonna have--
What the fuck?
Stop! Stop!
Sam?
- Ten- two- six- six. - Daniel, no!
No, no, no! Stop, stop, stop!
Georgia, come on.
Go! Go to the front door! Go--
G, go back! Go back! Go back!
- - No!
Sam!
He killed them.
They're not supposed to be able to do that.
translation.es: Se supone que no pueden hacer eso.

translation.en: They're programmed not to be able to do that.
translation.es: Están programados para no hacer eso.

translation.en: Stop it! Help me!
Holy shit!
- I've got to call my mom. - Shit!
My mom.
- Call the cops! -
- Oh shit! - Sarah!
Sarah. Sarah. Sarah! No!
- Sarah. - G. What the fuck?
- Fawn? -
- Fawn? - Yeah. Like a baby deer.
- Mmm- mmm. - Or Leaf?
Who the hell are you?
You said you wanted something to do with nature.
translation.es: Querías algo relacionado con la naturaleza.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, sure. But I meant…
I don't know, something like…
…river or--
Right. Because River is so much better than Leaf.
translation.es: Claro, porque Coral es mucho mejor que Jazmín.

translation.en: - - I'm sorry.
- It is, actually. - Oh yeah?
All right, forget nature. What's your first choice for a girl?
translation.es: Olvida la naturaleza. ¿Cuál es tu primera opción para una niña?

translation.en: How are you so sure that this is a baby girl?
translation.es: ¿Cómo estás tan segura de que es una niña?

translation.en: I don't know. I can tell.
I'm telling you it's a boy.
translation.es: Yo digo que es un niño.

translation.en: - No, it's not. - Yes, it is.
translation.es: - No, no es. - Sí, lo es.

translation.en: Shut up.
- I'm having girl dreams. - Mmm- hmm.
Yeah, you also had a dream you gave birth to a pony.
translation.es: Sí, también soñaste que dabas a luz a un poni.

translation.en: - No, I didn't. - You having a pony too?
- No, I didn't. When? - Oh my God. Yes, you did.
You told me you were gonna break up with me when I said we can ride that pony.
translation.es: Me dijiste que terminarías conmigo cuando dije que podíamos montarlo.

translation.en: - - Oh no!
I totally forgot about that.
- And we named her something. -
- G. - What?
Did you hear that?
Come back in, Sam.
- I think it's just an animal. - Come on.
translation.es: Creo que fue solo un animal. Vamos.

translation.en: What's up, Squirrel?
- Did you sleep all right? -
Bad dreams.
- - You okay?
My back hurts.
My boobs hurt.
My feet hurt.
And she won't stop kicking.
translation.es: Y ella no deja de patear.

translation.en: He.
Come on, babe, we got to get going. - Seriously. - Ugh.
translation.es: Vamos, cariño. Debemos irnos, en serio.

translation.en: You okay?
Yeah, my feet.
Keep telling you, you need to get the All Stars.
We've gotta clear six miles by sundown.
translation.es: Debemos hacer diez kilómetros antes del atardecer.

translation.en: As long as we stay away from the road, I think we'll be okay.
translation.es: Estaremos bien lejos de la carretera.

translation.en: You okay?
I'm always afraid they're gonna shoot us.
translation.es: Siempre tengo miedo de que nos disparen.

translation.en: Just do what they say. Move slowly.
translation.es: Haz lo que dicen. Muévete despacio.

translation.en: Stop. Hands up.
Put your packs down and turn around.
translation.es: Quítense las mochilas y dense la vuelta.

translation.en: - - Any weapons?
Uh, yeah, we have a machete and a revolver.
translation.es: Sí, tenemos un machete y un revólver.

translation.en: - Where are they? - In the pack.
What's the girl hiding under her shirt?
I'm nine months pregnant!
Walk backwards towards us.
Slowly.
One at a time. You, go ahead.
translation.es: Uno a la vez. Tú, adelante. Tú, detente.

translation.en: You, stop.
Put your palm up against this fence.
translation.es: Pon la mano en la cerca.

translation.en: Right over here.
Hold that pack low.
Put your palm up on the fence.
translation.es: Pon la mano en la cerca.

translation.en: No. No, no, no, you're over there.
Where are you guys coming from?
After the Blitz, we thought things would just get better.
translation.es: Después de la robolución, pensamos que todo mejoraría,

translation.en: We waited out for a few months, and then we tried to get to New York.
translation.es: esperamos unos meses y luego intentamos llegar a Nueva York.

translation.en: And then, on our way to New York, they detonated the electronic pulse thing.
translation.es: Y luego, camino a Nueva York, detonaron el pulso electromagnético.

translation.en: The EMP.
Yeah. Grunt freaked out and triggered it during an attack.
translation.es: Sí. Un soldado se asustó y lo activó durante un ataque.

translation.en: Once the EMP blast radius went down,
translation.es: Una vez que bajó el radio de explosión,

translation.en: the next wave of androids swarmed the soldiers and…
translation.es: la nueva ola de androides atacó a los soldados,

translation.en: Well, that was the end of New York City.
translation.es: y ese fue el fin de Nueva York.

translation.en: We ended up looping back up the long way.
translation.es: Terminamos en el camino más largo

translation.en: And now we're…  …trying to get to Boston.
translation.es: y ahora queremos llegar a Boston.

translation.en: Boston is fortified, but you can't get straight there.  Sorry.
translation.es: Boston está fortificado, pero no pueden ir directo ahí.

translation.en: The area surrounding it is no- man's- land.
translation.es: El área que lo rodea es tierra de nadie.

translation.en: Gonna be tough unless you can figure out a way to come in from the sea.
translation.es: Solo se puede llegar desde el mar.

translation.en: I wouldn't risk it while you're this far along.
translation.es: No me arriesgaría en tu estado.

translation.en: Oh, um, I… I can ask you.
Uh, when I give birth, I know that I have to cut the umbilical cord.
translation.es: Cuando dé a luz, debo cortar el cordón umbilical.

translation.en: I read it that I have to.
How do I get it out of me? Is it just gonna fall out or--
You can have the baby here.
What?
I can?
I mean, you're past due. You really shouldn't be traveling at all.
translation.es: Ya estás en fecha. No deberías viajar.

translation.en: Sam wants us to get to Boston before I give birth.
translation.es: Sam quiere que lleguemos a Boston antes de que dé a luz.

translation.en: We're trying to get to this.
Look.
Families with a child one year or younger,
translation.es: Las familias con hijos de un año o menos pueden tomar un barco

translation.en: they qualify to take a boat somewhere safe.
translation.es: Las familias con hijos de un año o menos pueden tomar un barco a un lugar seguro, tal vez a Asia.

translation.en: Maybe Asia.
translation.es: a un lugar seguro, tal vez a Asia.

translation.en: Have you heard anything about it?
Yeah. Um, couple of months ago, this is what everyone was doing.
translation.es: Sí, hace un par de meses, esto es lo que hacían todos.

translation.en: When did you get this?
In the spring. Why? Did you hear something?
I can ask around for you,
but I heard they were only taking the mothers and babies.
translation.es: Puedo preguntar por ti, pero oí que solo llevaban madres y bebés.

translation.en: No fathers.
It's a food supply thing.
You wanna hear the heartbeat?
Yeah.
Yo, what's up, man? Can I get one of those?
Nope.
You, uh, you know if they got any shipments going to Boston?
translation.es: ¿Sabes si hay algún cargamento que vaya a Boston?

translation.en: Anyone I can hitch a ride with?
My girl's pregnant, and we're trying to cut through the no- man's- land.
translation.es: Mi novia está embarazada. Queremos cruzar la tierra de nadie.

translation.en: No one's getting through no- man's- land. That's why it's called no- man's- land.
translation.es: Nadie atraviesa la tierra de nadie. Por eso se llama así.

translation.en: Yeah. I just mean, maybe there's a way for us to get to Boston.
translation.es: Quizá haya una forma de llegar a Boston.

translation.en: Boston is surrounded as fuck.
They got a strong holdout because of the troops and the EMPs.
translation.es: Está custodiado por las tropas y los pulsos electromagnéticos,

translation.en: But all it takes is one domino.
What you mean, domino?
You got a EMP, right?
You can only detonate it once.
Takes out everything with an electrical current within its blast radius.
translation.es: Destruye todo con corriente eléctrica dentro de su radio de explosión.

translation.en: Then all we got is guns.
Gun'll only do so much.
But that's what androids want.
Get us to blow an EMP
so they can get up nice and close.
You, uh, you know if they still shipping people out?
Like civilians off the coast?
You trying to hop over to China?
Maybe Korea.
Heard it's safer over there.
Maybe just a rumor.
translation.es: Tal vez sea solo un rumor.

translation.en: Yeah. I bet they still have boats.
translation.es: Sí, apuesto a que aún tienen barcos.

translation.en: Hard to say.
I'm not trying to run from this.
I got a family, man.
Who doesn't?
Please, I told you I had a hip replacement. Listen to me!
I don't know about no hip replacement.
translation.es: No sé si tienes una prótesis, pero activas mi detector.

translation.en: All I know is you light up my detector. Now step back!
translation.es: No sé si tienes una prótesis, pero activas mi detector. ¡Aléjate!

translation.en: Please! You wanna cut me open? You wanna see? I bleed red just like you.
Hey, you got metal in your bones. - You got five seconds to back off! - Please.
translation.es: Tienes metal en los huesos. ¡Retírate ya mismo!

translation.en: - Five! Get off the fence! Three! - No, please. They said they--
translation.es: - ¡Por favor! - ¡Sal de la cerca! ¡Ya! Por favor, dijeron que…

translation.en: The doctor hasn't heard anything about the Family Initiative for weeks.
translation.es: La doctora dijo que hace semanas que no sabe nada del Programa Familia.

translation.en: I talked to a soldier. He said they still got boats going out of Boston.
translation.es: Un soldado me dijo que aún salen barcos de Boston.

translation.en: Why would they still have boats if they're not taking families?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tendrían barcos si no llevan familias?

translation.en: I think we should stay.
We have… shelter.
We got a doctor.
Yeah, and what happens after?
We got days of walking left,
and we gotta get through no- man's- land without being noticed.
translation.es: Debemos cruzar la tierra de nadie sin que nos vean.

translation.en: It's not gonna be easy with Baby Boy with us.
translation.es: No será fácil hacerlo con el bebé.

translation.en: If you can find a safe way for us to go,
translation.es: Si encuentras una forma segura de ir,

translation.en: the soldiers can give us a ride or something…
translation.es: si los soldados nos llevan o algo…

translation.en: I'll go.
Fuck. I wish we still had the Internet.
Freezers.
Consistent pair of clean socks.
What if they only take one of us?
Where is this coming from?
She said something about…
only taking the mothers and the babies.
translation.es: como que solo llevan a madres y a bebés.

translation.en: She said they might not take you.
translation.es: Dijo que tal vez no te lleven.

translation.en: I mean, I… I guess… I guess you and the baby get on the boat, and I'll…
translation.es: Supongo que tú y el bebé subirán al barco,

translation.en: I don't know. I…
I'll just figure something else out, G.
Fuck you.
Wait, what? That's not what I wanna hear.
translation.es: - Espera, ¿qué? - Eso no es lo que quiero oír.

translation.en: Okay, Georgia.
What do you wanna hear?
I wanna hear that we're in this together.
translation.es: Quiero oír que estamos juntos en esto.

translation.en: That's what I thought that we were doing. - That-- - It is what we're doing.
translation.es: - Pensé que era así. - Es así.

translation.en: That we could have just gotten rid of this, but we didn't.
translation.es: Podríamos haber abortado, pero no lo hicimos.

translation.en: And this baby's on its way, Sam.
translation.es: El bebé está en camino, Sam.

translation.en: You're trying to put me on a boat by myself so I'm not your responsibility.
translation.es: Y quieres subirme en un barco sola para librarte de mí.

translation.en: I'm not saying that.
You asked me what I thought.
You're throwing a bunch of what- ifs at me. I'm trying to do the right thing.
translation.es: Son solo conjeturas. Intento hacer lo correcto.

translation.en: What part of putting me on a boat by myself
translation.es: ¿Qué parte de subirme a un barco sola

translation.en: is the right thing?
Okay, baby, can you chill?
You're being very hormonal right now.
No, baby--
I am allowed to have emotions! This is not me being hormonal!
translation.es: Puedo tener emociones. ¡No tiene nada que ver con las hormonas!

translation.en: I should have just broken up with you.
Why would you say that?
Forget it.
Where are you going?
- I'm gonna go get us a ride. -
Don't worry. I'm not abandoning you or whatever.
translation.es: No te preocupes. No te abandonaré ni nada.

translation.en: Game over! Game over!
- What time is it? - Game over.
What time is it? - -
We got a special treat for you tonight.
This is no android right here.
I know it looks too good to be true.
translation.es: Sé que parece demasiado bueno para ser cierto.

translation.en: This is 100% USDA prime beef right here.
translation.es: Esto es carne de primera calidad.

translation.en: Yo, man, how can I get a ride to Boston?
You could fight me for it.
- Ooh! - Oh, it's on now.
Or are you gonna run?
Oh, he's mad.
- Hey! - Where are you going?
Convoy's going up to Nashua tomorrow.
translation.es: El convoy irá a Nashua mañana.

translation.en: It'd get you just about as close as anyone can get.
Yeah. All you gotta do is…
translation.es: Sí, todo lo que tienes que hacer

translation.en: All you gotta do is put me flat on my back,
and you got yourself a ride.
Ooh!
What's it gonna be, little man?
Ladies! Ladies!
- Hey, ladies! - Whoa!
House rules. No holds barred.
translation.es: Reglas de la casa. Sin restricciones.

translation.en: And you rock till you drop.
There you go!
Don't run off now.
Miss.
Miss.
Can you come out here, please?
Miss.
Sam?
Where's Sam?
Sir.
Oh yeah.
Sam. What the fuck did you do to him?
He was fighting with a patrol officer last night.
translation.es: Anoche peleó con uno de mis oficiales.

translation.en: What?
I got a man with a busted skull who's blind in one eye.
translation.es: Le rompió el cráneo y quedará ciego de un ojo.

translation.en: No. No, I… I'm sorry, but that… that can't be what happened.
translation.es: No, lo siento, pero eso no puede ser cierto.

translation.en: I can account for a certain amount of rowdiness among the soldiers,
translation.es: Puedo tolerar alboroto entre los soldados,

translation.en: but I will not tolerate a guest on my base whaling on my boys.
translation.es: pero no toleraré que un invitado ataque a mis muchachos.

translation.en: What are you… what are you going to do to him?
Lady, I'm fighting a fucking war here against an enemy that literally never sleeps,
translation.es: Estoy librando una guerra contra un enemigo que nunca duerme,

translation.en: whose main objective is to wipe us off the face of the earth.
translation.es: cuyo objetivo es borrarnos de la faz de la tierra.

translation.en: We've got half a platoon, most of them barely trained.
translation.es: Tengo medio pelotón. La mayoría apenas entrenados.

translation.en: And I do not need a couple of kids too chickenshit to enlist, putting any of them out of commission.
translation.es: Y no permitiré que un par de cobardes deje a ninguno fuera de servicio.

translation.en: You're no longer welcome on this base.
translation.es: Ya no son bienvenidos en esta base.

translation.en: Sir, I'm…
I'm… I'm pregnant.
Congratulations.
Sir, I don't think you understand. I have permission from Dr. Howe--
translation.es: Señor, creo que no entiende. Tengo permiso de la doctora Howe.

translation.en: - - Yes, I've spoken to Dr. Howe.
translation.es: Sí, ya hablé con la doctora Howe.

translation.en: I've rescinded her request.
You got two minutes to get off my fucking base.
translation.es: - Señor… - Tienen dos minutos para largarse.

translation.en: Please.
Now you got one minute before I signal the other outposts and tell them not to let you in.
translation.es: Ahora solo un minuto antes que les diga a los demás puestos que no los acepten.

translation.en: Come on, G, let's go.
- Come on, man! Come on! - Let's go. Keep moving.
- Hey. - Hey.
Some painkillers. Some hydrogen peroxide. And medical gloves for him.
translation.es: Analgésicos, agua oxigenada, guantes médicos para él.

translation.en: Get back! I got a machete and a revolver in there.
translation.es: - ¡Atrás! - Vine con un machete y un revólver.

translation.en: I wish I could do more, but it's all I can spare.
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera hacer más, pero es lo que me queda.

translation.en: Cut the umbilical cord close to your baby and tie it off.
translation.es: Corta el cordón umbilical y átalo.

translation.en: The part connected to you will expel itself an hour after you give birth.
translation.es: La parte conectada a ti se caerá una hora después del nacimiento.

translation.en: Hey, women have been giving birth since way before people started calling themselves doctors.
translation.es: Las mujeres han dado a luz mucho antes de que existieran los doctores.

translation.en: You're gonna do great.
Okay. Thank you.
- Good luck. - Yeah.
- Yeah. - Yeah.
Ma'am, please. I had a revolver as well. I came--
translation.es: - Por favor, tenía un revólver. - No sé nada de eso.

translation.en: - I don't know about it. - I got a baby on the way.
translation.es: - Por favor, tenía un revólver. - No sé nada de eso. Por favor, mi novia está embarazada.

translation.en: My pregnant girlfriend. Please.
translation.es: Por favor, mi novia está embarazada.

translation.en: Look, there are androids out there, and it's just us. Please.
translation.es: Hay androides ahí afuera, y estamos solos. Por favor.

translation.en: Thank you.
G!
Georgia!
Look, G, I'm sorry that I was--
G, I was trying to get us a ride so that we could go to Boston.
translation.es: Intentaba conseguir un aventón para ir a Boston.

translation.en: You don't think I can protect you, but I can.
translation.es: Crees que no puedo protegerte, pero sí puedo.

translation.en: Protect me?
Asshole. Asshole.
You asshole. You dumb asshole! Asshole! You fucking asshole!
- You okay? - Yeah.
When the rain dies down, I'll try to start a fire.
translation.es: Cuando pare de llover, haré fuego.

translation.en: We can't. We can't.
We're practically in no- man's- land.
translation.es: Estamos casi en tierra de nadie.

translation.en: - What's going on, baby? Is it time? - No.
It just hurts.
Hey, Georgia.
Squirrel.
We can't do this.
We gotta get you warm.
Here.
Sam, careful.
It's okay.
Come on.
Come on.
Look, G, I didn't find a towel, but--
Thank you.
We are not having sex tonight, so don't you dare look at me.
translation.es: No tendremos sexo esta noche, así que ni me mires.

translation.en: I didn't even say anything.
I'm still so mad at you for being so dumb.
translation.es: Sigo enojada contigo por ser tan tonto.

translation.en: - It was so fucking dumb, Sam. - I know. I know.
translation.es: Eres un idiota, Sam. Lo sé.

translation.en: I'm sorry for saying what I said.
I don't know. I was just being…
Hormonal.
Watch it.
Thin ice.
Ugh! Please tell me there's a mattress somewhere in this house I can sleep on.
translation.es: Por favor, dime que hay un colchón en el que pueda dormir.

translation.en: My spine feels like it's gonna shatter.
translation.es: Siento que mi columna se va a romper.

translation.en: Anything good yet?
- Do you want me to help you? - Take this. - Huh? - Take this out of my mouth.
translation.es: - ¿Te ayudo? - Toma esto. En mi boca.

translation.en: - What? - Just take it!
Ow. Okay.
So good news.
This camera has one more photo in it,
translation.es: Esta cámara tiene una foto más,

translation.en: which means sometime soon,
you and me…
and Spruce…
can have an actual real- life family photo.
translation.es: tendremos una foto familiar de verdad.

translation.en: We are not naming our baby Spruce.
translation.es: No le pondremos Spruce al bebé.

translation.en: Everything we've heard about Boston is that it's surrounded.
translation.es: Todos dicen que Boston está rodeado.

translation.en: So we'd have to go up north.
Way north.
Maybe New Hampshire…
Portsmouth.
And then we'd have to find a boat or something
to bring us back down into Boston Harbor.
translation.es: que nos llevara al puerto de Boston.

translation.en: How long would that take?
Two weeks maybe.
And there's the boat stuff, which…
I don't know how to figure that out.
And how long to cut straight through?
It's 20 miles, so…
two days.
Probably three or four.
Twenty miles.
No checkpoints.
No EMPs.
Maybe no humans.
A lot of androids.
We'd have to be quiet.
Silent.
We would have to be silent.
We should have the baby here.
That really scares me, G.
Me too.
What if something goes wrong?
The doctor was right, Sam.
We make such a big deal about giving birth, but…
translation.es: Le damos mucha importancia a dar a luz,

translation.en: women used to give birth and then,
translation.es: pero las mujeres daban a luz y luego,

translation.en: I don't know, cut the umbilical cord with their teeth and keep on hunting.
translation.es: no sé, cortaban el cordón umbilical con los dientes y seguían cazando.

translation.en: Oh, what, so you're a hunter now?
- - Huh? You know what I mean.
Once the baby's here, we could just take our time.
translation.es: Cuando nazca el bebé, podríamos tomarnos un tiempo.

translation.en: Take the long way. It's dry here.
translation.es: Tomar el camino largo. Tenemos un techo.

translation.en: We have supplies.
We've been lugging that medical dictionary around for six months now.
translation.es: Llevamos seis meses cargando ese diccionario médico.

translation.en: Why don't we just stop?
Think it'll ever go back to normal?
I mean, I don't even know if it should.
But I do think it could be good still.
translation.es: Pero creo que podría ser algo bueno.

translation.en: Someday.
Oh my God.
Hey.
I got it to turn over a second ago.
translation.es: La hice arrancar hace un segundo.

translation.en: - Did it wake you up? - No.
Take it you saw the mass grave, huh?
They look… dug up.
Animals, I think.
What are you doing?
Fixing this.
Yeah, but why? We can't take it.
translation.es: Sí, pero ¿para qué? No podemos llevarla.

translation.en: Why not?
'Cause it will attract too much attention.
We'll just go on foot once the baby's here.
translation.es: Iremos a pie con el bebé.

translation.en: Look, G, I know you're not gonna like this,
translation.es: Mira, sé que no te va a gustar esto,

translation.en: but I need you to hear me out.
I'm trying to be smart.
You could have this baby today or in a week.
translation.es: Podrías tener el bebé hoy o en una semana.

translation.en: And I don't feel good about waiting on the edge of no- man's- land,
translation.es: No me gusta que nos quedemos aquí

translation.en: hoping no one finds us.
You wanna go straight through.
It's 20 miles.
And if we take this bike, we can get there by the end of the day.
translation.es: Con esta moto, podemos llegar al final del día.

translation.en: What… happened to going quietly, Sam?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasó con ir en silencio, Sam?

translation.en: What changed since last night?
Okay, G.
Let's say you have the baby,
and we pull off the home birth by ourselves.
translation.es: y logramos tener el parto en casa solos,

translation.en: Then we have a baby
translation.es: y tenemos un bebé que llora cuando tiene hambre

translation.en: who screams when he's hungry or when it's cold.
translation.es: y tenemos un bebé que llora cuando tiene hambre o cuando hace frío.

translation.en: We've been sneaking around so far, but we're not gonna be able to do that anymore.
translation.es: Nos hemos escabullido hasta ahora, pero ya no podremos hacerlo.

translation.en: Let's say we can stay quiet enough to make it up to New Hampshire.
translation.es: Digamos que podemos llegar hasta Nuevo Hampshire.

translation.en: What kind of boat are we gonna get? A motorboat?
Or gas or a sailboat?
I don't know how to sail, G. Do you?
That's scary to me.
Look, G.
I see a way that we can do this.
A way to make it okay.
G, I know you think I can't protect you, but I would kill for you.
translation.es: Crees que no puedo protegerte, pero mataría por ti.

translation.en: - Sam-- - I would die for you.
And I would do the same for our baby.
translation.es: Al igual que por nuestro bebé.

translation.en: So, please, G. Please.
Let me just fix this bike
so we can get the hell out of this dumb situation.
translation.es: para poder salir de esta situación.

translation.en: Today.
Today, G.
Okay.
Watch our backs.
You good, G?
Just my feet.
Mmm- hmm. Bet you want some All Stars now, don't you?
translation.es: Apuesto a que quieres unas All Star, ¿no?

translation.en: Get your shit, G. Let's go.
- Go! Go! -
- Start! - Go!
Hop on, G, come on!
- Did we lose him? - Hold on.
- G, did we lose him? - I think we lost him.
Oh shit!
G, grab the gun!
- Keep it straight. - Georgia.
- Keep it straight! - Georgia!
- Keep it straight! - Georgia!
I got her.
G, you need to stop?
Don't stop!
- Fuck, G! - Come on. Go! Don't slow down!
- Oh shit. - Don't slow down!
Fuck!
Sam.
Sam, we can't outrun them.
translation.es: Sam, no podemos escapar de ellos.

translation.en: - You need to get off! - What?
- I'll distract them with the gun. Listen. - Sam!
translation.es: - ¡Dame el arma! ¡Los distraeré! - ¡Sam! ¡Es nuestra única oportunidad!

translation.en: This is the only shot. If they chase me, you can get away.
translation.es: ¡Es nuestra única oportunidad! - Si me persiguen, puedes huir. - No.

translation.en: - No! - To the river.
translation.es: - Si me persiguen, puedes huir. - No.

translation.en: - I'll meet you there. I can outrun them. - Sam!
translation.es: Nos vemos en el río. Estaré bien.

translation.en: - - Sam! Sam!
Run, G!
They won't stop.
If you don't want them to catch you, come with me now.
translation.es: Si no quieres que te atrapen, ven.

translation.en: - My boyfriend-- - They've taken him.
Where?
I can help you, but you have to come with me.
Let me help you.
Please.
- Where are we going? - Shh.
They're everywhere.
It's okay.
Come on.
Is it safe to speak here?
You did all of this?
How have they not found this place?
translation.es: ¿Cómo es que no encontraron este lugar?

translation.en: Or you?
Hey!
Who are you?
You ever hear of Karel Čapek?
Is that you?
He was a writer.
Czech.
In 1920, he wrote a play.
And what does that have to do with anything?
In it, a man, scientist, tries to create new life.
translation.es: En ella, un hombre, un científico, intenta crear una nueva vida,

translation.en: Prove that there was no God.
His creations, the Roboti,
were these artificial creatures with living flesh and blood components.
translation.es: eran criaturas artificiales con componentes de carne y hueso.

translation.en: Essentially what the modern android is.
They look like us. They talk like us.
translation.es: Se parecen a nosotros. Hablan como nosotros.

translation.en: And it's commonplace to mistake a Roboti for a human.
translation.es: Y es común confundir a un roboti con un humano.

translation.en: And at first, they seem happy to serve man.
translation.es: Al principio, parecen felices de servir a los hombres,

translation.en: But in the end,
a Roboti rebellion leads to the extinction of human life.
translation.es: una rebelión roboti lleva a la extinción de la vida humana.

translation.en: This play introduced the word robot to human language,
translation.es: Esta obra introdujo la palabra robot en el lenguaje humano.

translation.en: and it ends with our extinction.
We knew what was coming the second we gave it a name.
translation.es: Supimos lo que vendría en cuanto le dimos un nombre.

translation.en: But sure, let's build million- dollar butlers
and assume it's all going to be okay.
translation.es: y supusieron que todo estaría bien.

translation.en: So fucking arrogant.
What did you do there? AI programmer.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hacías ahí? - Programador de inteligencia artificial.

translation.en: I'm alive because I know how they think.
translation.es: Estoy vivo porque sé cómo piensan.

translation.en: What happened that night, the night of the Blitz?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasó la noche de la robolución?

translation.en: They were supposed to be programmed not to kill us.
translation.es: Se suponía que no podían matarnos.

translation.en: What went wrong?
What went wrong was we built them in the first place.
translation.es: Lo que salió mal fue que los construimos.

translation.en: - I need to sleep. - Wait.
What's your name?
Thank you.
What's wrong with you?
I'm having contractions.
Has your water broken?
I gotta find Sam.
You need to forget about your friend.
He's not my friend.
He's…
he's the father.
Look,
I'm sorry for what you're going through.
I know it's not easy.
But you need to get with the program here.
- They're not butlers anymore. -
They're killing machines.
And they've jumped the evolutionary chain.
translation.es: Y saltaron la cadena de la evolución.

translation.en: They've hacked our programming,
and they'll use it against us until we're all dead.
translation.es: Hackearon nuestra programación y la usarán para matarnos.

translation.en: Hacked our programming. What do you mean?
We're not robots. You can't hack us.
translation.es: No somos robots. No pueden hackearnos.

translation.en: Love.
I know it sounds dumb, but that's what it is.
translation.es: Sé que suena tonto, pero es así.

translation.en: Human beings are programmed through hormones and primal urges
translation.es: Los seres humanos están programados a través de hormonas e impulsos primarios para tener conexiones emocionales.

translation.en: to have emotional connections.
translation.es: a través de hormonas e impulsos primarios para tener conexiones emocionales.

translation.en: It's what kept us alive this long.
translation.es: Es lo que nos mantuvo vivos.

translation.en: Parents, spouses, children.
But an android doesn't have that.
An android is expendable.
They don't have self- preservation, and they'll sacrifice themselves
translation.es: No tienen instinto de supervivencia, y se sacrifican a sí mismos y a los demás

translation.en: and others if it brings them closer to their goal.
translation.es: No tienen instinto de supervivencia, y se sacrifican a sí mismos y a los demás para alcanzar su objetivo.

translation.en: They can reason past sentiment and emotional bond.
translation.es: Pueden razonar más allá de los sentimientos y los lazos emocionales.

translation.en: It's love.
Love makes us selfish.
Love will kill us all.
translation.es: El amor nos matará a todos.

translation.en: I can't leave him to die.
You wanna live?
Of course.
Save yourself.
That's what they would do.
translation.es: Eso es lo que ellos harían.

translation.en: They have strategy like you wouldn't believe.
Please. Please.
Just listen to me.
Why do you care so much?
Can I?
Hey.
Hey.
- They're all dead. - I know.
- They're all dead. - I know.
They're all dead.
- They're all dead. - I know.
It's okay.
Hey, it's okay.
Shh. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.
You were headed to Boston, right?
I can take you.
I can get you there. I can get you there safe.
translation.es: Puedo hacer que llegues a salvo.

translation.en: How?
This.
About eight years ago, we started developing camouflage algorithms
translation.es: Hace ocho años, desarrollamos algoritmos de camuflaje

translation.en: for our complex in Eastern Europe.
translation.es: para nuestros conflictos en Europa del Este.

translation.en: Androids see UV, heat sensors, night vision.
translation.es: Los androides ven rayos ultravioleta, sensores de calor, visión nocturna.

translation.en: But this algorithm created a mask against all of that.
translation.es: Pero este algoritmo creó una máscara contra todo eso.

translation.en: - That makes you invisible? - To the eye.
But they can hear you. They can smell you. They're not stupid.
translation.es: Pero pueden oírte. Pueden olerte. No son estúpidos.

translation.en: They know this tech exists, so they look for it.
translation.es: Saben de esta tecnología, así que la buscan.

translation.en: But it gives us a shot.
I'm not leaving without Sam.
This…
camouflage or whatever you wanna call it,
it gives me a chance to go and get him.
translation.es: me da la oportunidad de ir a buscarlo.

translation.en: I'm not letting you take my armor for that.
translation.es: No te daré mi armadura para eso.

translation.en: Fine. Then keep it.
It doesn't matter. Either way, I'm gonna go get him.
translation.es: No importa. Iré por él igual.

translation.en: You can die.
I really did try to help you.
I hope you remember that.
Let's go.
Please, just let me go!
No! Please! No, no!
See the movement?
- Yeah. - Patrols.
What are they doing to them?
- Using them as bait. - For who?
For you.
He won't be the only one they've captured.
translation.es: No será el único que capturaron.

translation.en: You're not coming with me?
I only have two.
You'll need one for him if you wanna get him out of there.
translation.es: Necesitas uno para él si quieres sacarlo.

translation.en: Are you sure this thing works?
Yeah. Why wouldn't it?
You find him, and you put this on him.
Get him out of there, and you do it silently.
They're gonna notice he's disappeared.
translation.es: Se darán cuenta de que desapareció.

translation.en: You have four miles till you get to the edge of no- man's- land.
translation.es: Tienes seis kilómetros para salir de la tierra de nadie.

translation.en: They won't stop until they detect the EMP radius signal. Understand?
translation.es: No se detendrán hasta que detecten la señal del PEM. ¿Entiendes?

translation.en: Or you could just walk away.
You could walk away right now.
He would never know.
I'd know.
Let me out! Let me out!
Okay.
Sam. Sam.
G…
- What did they do to you? - G, get out of here.
translation.es: ¿Qué te hicieron? - Vete de aquí. - Oye.

translation.en: - Hey! - I'm here now.
- - Hey! - Shh. - Please help me out.
Stop it. Be quiet.
You don't understand. You don't understand.
They're right there. Please. Be quiet.
translation.es: Por favor, están ahí. - ¿Me ayudarás? - ¡Basta! ¡Por favor, cállate!

translation.en: Stop it. Be quiet. Please be quiet.
- Be quiet. - I can help you. - I can help you. Let me out. - Wait. Stop. Please be quiet. Please.
translation.es: - ¡Cállate! Por favor, cállate. - Puedo ayudarte. Desátame.

translation.en: Hey.
Hey, come here, you fucking piece of shit!
Come here!
Come here, you fucking--
Sam. Wait.
Hey!
Hey! Hey, come on. Just help me out.
I can help you.
- Bitch! - Put this on. - Bitch! - Put this on.
If you don't fucking help me, I'm gonna scream.
translation.es: Si no me ayudas, voy a gritar,

translation.en: And every single one of those motherfuckers is gonna come in here.
translation.es: y van a venir todos esos hijos de puta.

translation.en: Let's go.  Hey!
- Stop it! - Hey!
Hey! Come on!
Hey! Get me out of here. Come on!
No. It's happening.
We have to move.
Try not to move.
- Where am I? - Boston.
Where's Sam?
He's right there.
Hi, Squirrel.
Hey.
He's been through a lot, but before we talk about Sam,
translation.es: Ha sufrido mucho, pero antes de hablar de Sam, creo que deberíamos hablar…

translation.en: I think we should talk about this…
healthy baby boy.
I told you.
Hey.
Hi, baby.
Your friend has been resting. He collapsed after getting you here.
translation.es: Tu amigo está descansando. Se desmayó después de traerlos aquí.

translation.en: They're gonna want to talk to him when he wakes up.
translation.es: Querrán hablar con él cuando despierte.

translation.en: How did we get here?  He got you through the checkpoint.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo llegamos aquí? - Los llevó hasta el puesto de control.

translation.en: Caused quite a fuss with the soldiers.
translation.es: Causó un gran alboroto con los soldados.

translation.en: But when they saw you were midway through delivery and unconscious,
translation.es: Pero cuando vieron que estabas a mitad del parto e inconsciente,

translation.en: we got you in here and performed a C- section.
Thank you.
It's a nice change having some life here.
translation.es: Es un lindo cambio tener algo de vida aquí.

translation.en: Some base personnel are gonna be coming by to ask a few questions, security related.
translation.es: Personal de la base vendrá a hacer unas preguntas de seguridad.

translation.en: I told them that you need your rest, but they just need to clear some things up.
translation.es: Les dije que deben descansar, pero quieren aclarar algunas cosas.

translation.en: Excuse me. I…
The base nurse should be in here.
I love you.
Yeah. Let's go say hi to Daddy.
translation.es: Sí, vamos a saludar a papá.

translation.en: Come here. Give me your little hand.
You wanna say hi to Daddy?
Oh, little man.
Been waiting for you, buddy.
I think we can all agree
that, in hindsight,
my plan to get us here was a stunning success.
translation.es: mi plan para llegar hasta aquí fue un gran éxito.

translation.en: We're a wreck…
but we did it.
You haven't even seen the worst part yet, G.
translation.es: Aún no has visto la peor parte.

translation.en: Okay, there's really not a funny way to tell you this, but…
translation.es: Bueno, no hay forma graciosa de decirte esto, pero…

translation.en: Oh, Sam.
It's all right.
Why'd they do this to you?
I was all smashed up.
It was the best they could do.
They said we'd know in a few days if I'm gonna be okay,
translation.es: En unos días sabremos si estaré bien,

translation.en: but I just got to take it easy for now.
translation.es: debo tomarlo con calma por ahora.

translation.en: But soon as we get to Korea,
translation.es: Pero en cuanto lleguemos a Corea,

translation.en: I'm for sure getting some of those robot feet.
'Cause that definitely sounds safe.
- Shh. - Why are you so good?
Because it's what dads are supposed to be.
translation.es: Porque así deben ser los papás.

translation.en: Okay.
Yeah.
He feels like Forest to me.
translation.es: Creo que Forest le queda bien.

translation.en: - What's your name? - Georgia.
And his name?
And the guy who brought you here?
translation.es: ¿Y el tipo que te trajo aquí?

translation.en: Arthur. I don't… I don't know his last name.
- So you came from? - Central Mass.
translation.es: Así que vinieron de… Del centro de Massachusetts. Cerca del Quabbin.

translation.en: Near the Quabbin.
translation.es: Del centro de Massachusetts. Cerca del Quabbin.

translation.en: We, uh,
we ended up making it to Philly before we looped back up.
translation.es: Llegamos a Filadelfia antes de tener que regresar.

translation.en: We were trying to get out of the country with the Family Initiative.
translation.es: Queríamos salir del país con el Programa Familia.

translation.en: We heard that they were still getting people out of Boston. Is that true?
translation.es: Oímos que seguían sacando gente de Boston. - ¿Es verdad? - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah. They are.
- Can I speak with you about-- - Oh, we're not done.
- Okay. - So how'd you meet the guy, Arthur?
Well, I guess I'll start with the--
We had to get across the no- man's- land.
translation.es: Tuvimos que cruzar la tierra de nadie

translation.en: And we didn't wanna risk giving birth there.
translation.es: y no queríamos que el bebé nazca ahí.

translation.en: So we found this dirt bike, and we decided to use that to get across,
translation.es: Encontramos una moto y decidimos usarla para cruzar,

translation.en: and we only got halfway before we ran into some androids.
translation.es: pero a la mitad nos encontramos con unos androides.

translation.en: They separated us.
I hid, but they… they took Sam.
translation.es: Yo me escondí, pero se llevaron a Sam.

translation.en: They took him? For what?
I don't know.
I mean, they just…
they took him.
They held him prisoner. They had a… a house full of prisoners.
translation.es: Lo tuvieron preso. Tenían una casa llena de presos.

translation.en: So how'd you meet this guy, Arthur?
He was in the woods when it happened. He…
translation.es: Estaba en el bosque cuando sucedió.

translation.en: - He saved me. - How?
He took me back to his truck. And he…
Well, he helped me figure out a way to get Sam out of the house, and so I…
translation.es: y me ayudó a encontrar la forma de sacar a Sam de la casa. Así que…

translation.en: I went in, and I got him.
You just walked in?
I mean, you probably saw it on the truck already. But he…
translation.es: Probablemente ya lo viste en la camioneta,

translation.en: Uh, he used to work at… Raster Robotics.
translation.es: pero él trabajaba en Raster Robotics.

translation.en: - He told you that? - Yes.
So he… he was a…
um, a programmer, and he built this…
this armor, um, that
camouflages you from the androids.
translation.es: que te camufla de los androides.

translation.en: It makes you invisible to them.
What?
You put it on, and it makes you invisible to the androids.
translation.es: Te la pones y te hace invisible para los androides.

translation.en: He told you it makes you invisible?
He didn't just tell me.
I used it.
I went in, and I… and I went into the house, and I wore it…
translation.es: Entré a la casa, me la puse…

translation.en: and they couldn't see me.
What?
What?
You just walked into the house, and they couldn't see you?
translation.es: ¿Entraste a la casa y no te vieron?

translation.en: Yes. That technology doesn't exist.
Okay. Well…
I'm telling you that it does because I wore it, and it worked.
translation.es: Te digo que sí. La usé y funcionó.

translation.en: And I'm telling you if that existed, don't you think we'd be using it?
translation.es: Y yo te digo que si existiera, ¿no crees que la usaríamos?

translation.en: So you need to start straightening this story out so it starts making sense.
translation.es: Debes empezar a aclarar esta historia para que tenga sentido.

translation.en: What… happened out there?
Human beings are programmed to have emotional connections.
translation.es: Los seres humanos están programados para tener conexiones emocionales.

translation.en: Parents, spouses, children.
They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead.
An android is expendable.
They don't have self- preservation, and they'll sacrifice themselves
translation.es: No tienen instinto de supervivencia, y se sacrifican a sí mismos

translation.en: and others if it brings them closer to their goal.
translation.es: y a los demás para alcanzar su objetivo.

translation.en: They have strategy like you wouldn't believe.
I think I made a mistake.
- Wait here. -
- It's okay. -
Sam, get up! Sam, get up!
Come on. Sam! You gotta wake up.
EMP.
He's gonna disable the EMP.
I'm gonna come back. I promise.
- Go, go, go, go! - Breach! Breach!
- - Swarm 8s!
It's okay. Don't cry. Be quiet. Mama's here.
Please be quiet.
translation.es: Mamá está aquí. Por favor, cállate.

translation.en: I warned you.
What are you gonna do with that?
They're all dead.
They're all dead.
They're all dead. They're all dead.
They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead.
They're all dead. They're all dead.
We were programmed to be emotive to make you feel comfort.
translation.es: Fuimos programados para ser emotivos para que se sientan cómodos.

translation.en: Are you comfortable?
Boston's going down today. You can't stop us now.
translation.es: Boston caerá hoy. Ya no pueden detenernos.

translation.en: So, are you gonna disable that EMP for me?
translation.es: ¿Vas a desactivar el PEM por mí?

translation.en: Or you going to make me kill your baby?
translation.es: ¿O me harás matar a tu bebé?

translation.en: Oh my God.
Stop!
Stop!
Fuck.
Hey.
Hey.
I love you, Sam.
I love you too, Squirrel.
Take it.
G.
We gotta move.
- - Over here! Wait! - Wait. Here! -
Please, over here.
He's going to scan you. Do not move.
translation.es: Los va a escanear. No se muevan.

translation.en: Remove.
I… I don't know what paperwork you might need or…
translation.es: No sé qué papeles necesitan o…

translation.en: We don't… we don't have anything, but I just--
I'm sorry.
I… I know that you only take the mothers.
translation.es: Sé que solo llevan a las madres.

translation.en: I can only take the baby.
What?
Korea will only take the baby. Not the parents.
translation.es: Corea solo llevará al bebé, no a los padres.

translation.en: Please.
- Sorry. - You don't understand.
- Please. Please just-- - There's no space.
You can take us. It's only three of us.
I… I promise I will do anything.
translation.es: Prometo que haré lo que sea.

translation.en: - Please. - Sorry.
- Please take us. - It's not just the space.
translation.es: - ¡Por favor, llévennos! - Lo siento. No es solo el espacio. Es otra boca que alimentar.

translation.en: You're another mouth to feed.
translation.es: No es solo el espacio. Es otra boca que alimentar.

translation.en: Another person to take care for medical attention.
translation.es: Otra persona a la que cuidar, asistencia médica.

translation.en: When you get to Korea, you will need a job.
You will need a house. You see?
Please.
The baby is simple.
But you're not.
He's very ill.
G.
I'm gonna make it work. I'm gonna get us on the plane.
I'm gonna get us on the boat, I promise.
It's gonna be okay.
It's gonna be okay.
I don't think I'm gonna pull through this, G.
Don't say that.
- We'll be fine. - Just listen. Just listen to me.
G, if he stays here,
there's a good chance he'll die.
If he's out there,
there's a good chance he'll live.
Look at me, G. I'm fucked.
I'm bleeding out here.
I don't think I'm fully pulling through this.
translation.es: No creo que salga de esta.

translation.en: I can't protect you, G.
And you can't really protect him. Not really.
translation.es: Y tú no puedes protegerlo. En realidad no.

translation.en: This could be a good thing.
Let's give him a chance.
I love you, buddy.
Can I just have one minute? Just one minute, please. Just…
translation.es: ¿Me das un minuto? Un minuto, por favor.

translation.en: Fill this out.
Thank you.
My boy.
My son.
My love.
I didn't want any of this for you.
translation.es: No quería nada de esto para ti.

translation.en: I would have done anything to give you a normal life.
translation.es: Habría hecho lo que fuera para darte una vida normal.

translation.en: One with parents
and a home
and friends down the street.
You would have gone to school in the city that you were born
translation.es: Habrías ido a la escuela en la ciudad donde naciste

translation.en: and come home and told us about your day.
translation.es: y, al volver, nos contarías sobre tu día.

translation.en: We would have taken summers on the shore.
translation.es: Habríamos pasado los veranos en la costa.

translation.en: And that's where some of the most intense memories of childhood would have been.
translation.es: Ahí habrías tenido los recuerdos más vívidos de tu infancia.

translation.en: Your father would have read to you in silly voices.
translation.es: Tu papá te habría leído cuentos con voces tontas,

translation.en: You would go to sleep dreaming of the adventures you would have with your friends in the woods.
translation.es: y habrías soñando con las aventuras que vivirías con tus amigos en el bosque.

translation.en: In the perfect world, none of this would have happened.
translation.es: En un mundo perfecto, nada de esto habría pasado.

translation.en: We would have worked to be the best parents we could have been.
translation.es: Habríamos trabajado para ser los mejores padres.

translation.en: We would have been a family,
and the world wouldn't be falling apart.
translation.es: Y el mundo no se desmoronaría.

translation.en: But I can't give you that.
I can't give you any of it.
translation.es: No puedo darte nada de eso.

translation.en: So instead,
I'm going to give you the only thing that I have left.
translation.es: te daré lo único que me queda.

translation.en: A chance.
A chance at a normal life,
translation.es: La oportunidad de una vida normal,

translation.en: with a new family in a new place.
translation.es: con una nueva familia, en un nuevo lugar.

translation.en: I need you to know that I love you.
translation.es: Necesito que sepas que te amo.

translation.en: I need you to know that I wanted you.
translation.es: Necesito que sepas que te quería.

translation.en: God, I wanted you in my life. I…
translation.es: Dios, te quería en mi vida.

translation.en: I wanted you by my side.
- I just couldn't-- - Time to go.
translation.es: - No pude… - Es hora de irnos.

translation.en: Please let me finish this. I'm almost done. If you just--
Sorry. We must go now.
Okay. Okay
Okay.
What's your name?
Please find someone who will take care of him.
translation.es: Por favor, encuentra a alguien que lo cuide.

translation.en: Someone who will love him.
Please.
- He's gonna be okay. - He's gonna be okay. - He's gonna be okay. - He's gonna be okay.
translation.es: - Va a estar bien. - Va a estar bien.

translation.en: He's gonna be okay. He's gonna be okay.
He's gonna be okay.
translation.es: - Va a estar bien. - Va a estar bien.

translation.en: He's gonna be okay.
He's gonna be okay.  He's gonna be okay.

translation.en: He's gonna be okay.
He's gonna be okay.
Drop the pack.
Hold out your hand.
She's good.
We're heading to Portland.
translation.es: Vamos a Portland. Hay una nueva base allí.

translation.en: They're setting up a new base there. We're bringing whoever we can find.
translation.es: Vamos a Portland. Hay una nueva base allí. Llevamos a quien sea. ¿Quieres venir con nosotros?

translation.en: Do you wanna come with us?
translation.es: Llevamos a quien sea. ¿Quieres venir con nosotros?

Okay. Let's go!
